properties.title: Chalkis
properties.summary: The mint at the ancient site of Chalkis in Mysia. The identification of the site with modern Çıplak Adası is uncertain. For the ancient mint of Chalkis in Euboia, see http://nomisma.org/id/chalcis, for the medieval mint of Chalkis in Euboia, see http://nomisma.org/id/negroponte_medieval.
